```{python}
import pandas as pd

fresh_df = pd.DataFrame({
    "language": ["Latin", "Greek", "Sanskrit", "Finnish"],
    "family":   ["Indo-European", "Indo-European", "Indo-European", "Uralic"],
    "speakers_millions": [0, 0, 0, 6],
    "location": ["Italy", "Greece", "India", "Finland"]
})

print(fresh_df)
fresh_df["language"]           # Series
fresh_df[["language","family"]] # DataFrame
```

```{python}
import pandas as pd

eng_vowels = pd.DataFrame({
    "symbol": ["i", "ɪ", "e", "ɛ", "æ", "u", "ʊ", "o", "ɔ", "ɑ", "ʌ", "ə"],
    "height": [
        "high",   # i
        "high",   # ɪ
        "mid",    # e
        "mid",    # ɛ
        "low",    # æ
        "high",   # u
        "high",   # ʊ
        "mid",    # o
        "mid",    # ɔ
        "low",    # ɑ
        "mid",    # ʌ
        "mid"     # ə
    ],
    "backness": [
        "front",   # i
        "front",   # ɪ
        "front",   # e
        "front",   # ɛ
        "front",   # æ
        "back",    # u
        "back",    # ʊ
        "back",    # o
        "back",    # ɔ
        "back",    # ɑ
        "central", # ʌ
        "central"  # ə
    ],
    "tense": [
        True,   # i
        False,  # ɪ
        True,   # e
        False,  # ɛ
        False,  # æ
        True,   # u
        False,  # ʊ
        True,   # o
        False,  # ɔ
        True,   # ɑ
        False,  # ʌ
        False   # ə
    ],
    "rounded": [
        False,  # i
        False,  # ɪ
        False,  # e
        False,  # ɛ
        False,  # æ
        True,   # u
        True,   # ʊ
        True,   # o
        True,   # ɔ
        False,  # ɑ
        False,  # ʌ
        False   # ə
    ],
})

eng_vowels
```
